name: CrossFi
description: CrossFi is the Apple Pay for Crypto. For the first time in history, anyone with a Web3 wallet can spend crypto through physical or virtual Visa cards anywhere in the world where Visa is accepted. Visa is officially the first worldwide payment technology leader that enables on-chain transactions natively in their ecosystem through this groundbreaking partnership with CrossFi. Just link your wallet, get your card, and start spending. CrossFi Visa card transactions have already been successfully processed in New York, Los Angeles, London, Dubai, China, Japan, and over 20 other countries and will continue to roll out to the rest of the world throughout the next few months.
